mapper.select: /* Logo.selectLogoList */ SELECT CC.CMN_COM_IDX , CC.CMN_COM_NM , LM.LGO_MST_IDX , LM.LGO_MST_ATT_PATH || LM.LGO_MST_SYS_NM AS WEB_PATH , LM.LGO_MST_SYS_NM , LM.LGO_MST_ORG_NM FROM T_CMM_COM CC LEFT OUTER JOIN T_LGO_MST LM ON LM.LGO_MST_TYPE = CC.CMN_COM_IDX WHERE CC.CMN_COM_UP_IDX = #{LOGO_TYPE} AND CC.CMN_COM_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CC.CMN_COM_IDX ASC
